text: Basanta Prasad Manandhar (Nepali: बसन्त प्रसाद मानन्धर) is a Nepalese politician. He became a member of the Bagmati Provincial Assembly in February 2018. He had previously served as Minister for Water, Energy and Irrigation of Bagmati Province. == References == Category:Nepalese politicians Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Basanta Prasad Manandhar
